new_products.name: Rohto HadaLabo Gokujyun Perfect Gel  Refill (Moisturiser) 80g
new_products.short_description: HadaLabo Koi Gokujyun Perfect Gel provides hydration deep into the stratum corneum and locks in moisture.
new_products.description:
Hada Labo Koi-Gokujyun Perfect Gel is a moisturizing gel works as a toner, essence, serum, moisturizer, and mask all in one. Perfect for those lazy nights or when you're pressed for time in the morning. 

Enriched with 4 kinds of hyaluronic acid at various molecular weights to deeply hydrate the skin and to improve the skin's moisture-retention abilities, glycerin, urea, and squalane to intensely moisturize the skin, while the ceramides work to strengthen the skin barriers and collagen to restore firmness and elasticity the skin. 

This formula helps to firm the skin and instantly hydrates it and provides it with long-lasting moisture and smoothness.  

INGREDIENTS:


Water, BG, glycerin, hydroxyethyl urea, pentylene glycol, PPG-10 methyl glucose, triethylhexanoin, squalane, (acryloyldimethyltaurate ammonium/VP) copolymer, behenyl alcohol, sodium acetylated hyaluronate (super hyaluronic acid), hyaluronic acid Na, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid (nanized hyaluronic acid), hydroxypropyltrimonium hyaluronate (skin adsorbing hyaluronic acid), hydrolyzed collagen, glucosylceramide (ceramide), Suizenjinori polysaccharide (cherry), dimethicone, PPG-17 butes -17, triethyl citrate, cyclopentasiloxane, phenoxyethanol, disodium succinate, dimethicone crosspolymer, agar, EDTA-2Na, succinate, a-glucan, acrylates copolymer ammonium, methylparaben

new_products.short_description:
For clear, glowy skin. Bring your skin's natural beauty to you with simple care. 

●For those who tend to get cloudy, this all-in-one gel contains carefully selected beauty ingredients that smoothly penetrate all the way to the stratum corneum, giving your skin a clear, spotless appearance.

new_products.name: Meishoku Bigan Fuwa Moko Facial Medicated Cleansing Foam 120g
new_products.short_description: Moisturizing anti-acne facial cleansing foam. Developed based on years of acne research. This cleansing foam perfectly cleans and prevents acne and protects skin from roughness. The fluffy, flexible foam eliminates friction and removes sebum from deep within pores.
new_products.description:
Bigan Fuwa Moko Facial Medicated Cleansing Foam is a moisturizing anti-acne facial cleansing foam from Japanese company Meishoku. Developed based on years of acne research. This cleansing foam perfectly cleans and prevents acne and protects skin from roughness. The fluffy, flexible foam eliminates friction and removes sebum from deep within pores. The potent moisturizing ingredient "isomerized sugar" secures skin hydration while washing the face and strengthens the barrier function of the stratum corneum. new_products.name: Kitao Matcha & Chia Enzyme Powder (30 Pouches)
new_products.description:
Kitao Matcha & Chia enzyme powder is gentle enough to protect your skin’s natural barrier, yet strong enough to buff away all the dead skin and impurities that get trapped deep in your pores. We love using superfoods in our formulas, and this enzyme powder wash is no exception! Not only do you get ingredients like our organic matcha, açai, and quinoa, but this formula also includes papaya extract– An ingredient rich in enzymes that will brighten your skin and help fight signs of aging. What’s extra unique about this enzyme wash is that the formula starts as a dry powder, and once it’s applied to wet skin it totally transforms into a dense foam that buffs, brightens, and leaves your skin glowing. 

Ingredients:

Sekken-Na / K(P), Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Talc, Dextrin, Bentonite, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Lauric Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder, Sodium Methyl Lauroyl Taurate, Silica, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Papain, Protease, Disodium Phosphate, P Potassium Phosphate, Potassium-containing soap base, cornstarch, talc, dextrin, bentonite, sodium cocoylglycine, lauric acid, tea leaves, sodium lauroylmethyltaurine, silica, cellulose gum, sodium citrate, sodium bicarbonate, papain, protease, diNa phosphate, K phosphate, tea leaf extract, hydrolyzed collagen, sodium hyaluronate, ceramide NP, ceramide AP, ceramide EOP, phytosphingosine, cholesterol, sodium lauroyl lactylate, carbomer, xanthan gum, (Acai palm/Euterpeprecatria/Acacia palmatum) Fruit extract, quinoa seed extract, Salvia hispanica seed oil, BG, glycerin, water, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, (Euterpe Oleracea / Euterpe Precatoria / Theobroma Grandiflorum) Fruit Extract, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Water
new_products.guide:
WHEN TO USE:

Use this Enzyme Powder Wash after cleansing, but before applying any essences or moisturizers. We recommend using it once you’ve removed your makeup, and always on damp skin.

HOW TO APPLY:

Start by soaking your foaming net in lukewarm water and emptying a packet of enzyme powder onto the net. Next, start adding air into the product by rubbing the net together in a circular motion. Once you’re all nice & sudsy, take the lather you’ve created and scoop it up into your palms. The final step is spreading that lather all over your face and neck and letting the exfoliating begin! To remove, simply rinse off with water and you’re all set!

new_products.name: Kitao Matcha & Chia Exfoliating Gel  300g
new_products.description:
Kitao Matcha & Chia exfoliating gel not only removes dead skin cells, or trapped impurities on your skin, but it also leaves your pores smaller, your face more hydrated, and your skin brighter. Sound too good to be true? We promise it’s not! This formula contains all the superfoods your skin craves (matcha, quinoa, chia seed & açai), but also includes ultra nutrient-dense ingredients like artichoke leaf extract and camellia sinensis leaf powder. No matter what the day throws at your skin, we guarantee this exfoliating gel will be able to remove it (even the dirt that gets trapped deep in pores!). If you’ve tried exfoliants before that were too harsh and left your skin feeling dry and irritated, then this is the perfect gentle solution. And, because our formula is so gentle, it’s safe to use on all skin types.

This gentle exfoliant is safe to use for all skin types.

Ingredients:

Water, Glycerin, Acrylates/C 10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Dicocodimonium Chloride, Steartrimonium Bromide (Euterpe Oleracea/ Euterpe Precatoria/Theobroma Grandiflorum)Fruit Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Saxifraga Sarmentosa Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel)Leaf Extract, Prunus Persica(Peach)Leaf Extract, Cynara Scolymus (Artichoke) Leaf Extract, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Trehalose Hydroxypropyltrimonium-Chloride, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexy|glycerin, Phytosphingosine, Sodium, Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Butylene Glycol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol
new_products.guide:
When to Use:

Use this Exfoliating Gel after you’ve cleansed and prior to using any moisturizers or serums. Can be used during your AM or PM skincare routines. We recommend using this twice a week for the best result.

How to use:

After you’ve finished cleansing, pump gel into dry hands and apply to your skin. For best results, let the gel sit on your skin for a few seconds (you’ll notice it transform into an opaque, white color). Once the formula has changed color, begin rubbing in gel to start exfoliating (make sure to avoid your eye area when rubbing!). To remove, rinse with water and pat skin dry.

The oil formula allows the cleanser to deeply penetrate small pores and extract dirt and unwanted particles without stealing away its natural components.

featured_products.name: Naturie Hatomugi Skin Conditioner Lotion 500ml
featured_products.short_description: Naturie Hatomugi Skin Conditioner retains your moisture and conditions your skin with natural plant ingredient, hatomugi extract (moisturizing). Though moisturizing, it will not feel sticky and blends smoothly with dry, rough areas of the skin.
featured_products.description:
Naturie?Skin Conditioner is a light and non-sticky moisturizing lotion featuring natural Job's tears (hatomugi) extract to deeply hydrate skin and keep it soft and smooth. 

Containing the maximum amount of water possible, it smoothly glides over the skin with a refreshing sensation, sinking deep into the skin as soon as you apply it. 

It also contains job's tears (hatomugi) and vitamin c, which have anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidative effects. 
 

FEATURES:


 

  • It replenishes the skin's moisture content and keeps the hydration inside, all without relying on heavy oils.
  • It does not leave your skin feeling greasy or coated in product, yet keeps the skin moisturized all day, making it perfect for a variety of uses.
  • Perfect for moisturizing skin all over the body and face.
  • Soothes redness after sunburn with a pleasant cooling sensation.
  • Holds moisture in after showering or bathing.
  • Suitable for both oily and dry skins.



Ingredients- Water, DPG, BG, glycerin, pearl barley extract, 2K glycyrrhizinate, (styrene/acrylates) copolymer, ethanol, citric acid, sodium citrate, methylparaben
featured_products.guide:
DIRECTIONS OF USE:

After washing face or body, drop a generous amount onto your palm or facial cotton pad and apply to skin gently.

featured_products.name: Rohto HadaLabo Shirojyun Premium Deep Whitening Cream (Moisturiser)  50g
featured_products.short_description:
Luxurious brightening cream penetrates deep into skin and suppresses melanin production to prevent freckles and spots from forming.

Formula treats sun damaged skin to leave it clear and radiant, without a sticky after-feel.

Slightly acidic formula is gentle on skin.

Free of fragrances, artificial colorants, mineral oils and alcohols.
featured_products.description:
Hada Labo Shirojyun Premium Deep Whitening Cream is formulated with white tranexamic acid to treat dark spots, freckles, and other skin discolorations. 

Shirojyun Premium product series contains White Tranexamic Acid. This skincare component suppresses the generation of melanin, preventing the arise of mottled and freckled skin. It also has an anti-inflammatory effect to protect your skin from UV damage. 

This Japanese whitening cream for face also contains nano hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and Vitamin C to hydrate and protect your skin from dryness. 
 



 

Ingredient:

Key Ingredients-  

Tranexamic acid, glycyrrhizic acid 2K, Vitamin C derivatives , Vitamin E, 2 types of Hyaluronic Acid.


Other ingredients:

Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Na-2 Hyaluronate, Vitamin C Mg Phosphate, Vitamin E, Shea Butter, DPG, a Olefin Oligomer, Pentylene Glycol, Diglycerin, Tri(Caprylic-Capric) Glyceryl, Meadowfoam Oil, Dimethicone, lipophilic glyceryl stearate, POE(20) sorbitan isostearate, carboxyvinyl polymer, hydroxyethylcellulose, edetate, sodium pyrosulfite, stearyl alcohol
featured_products.guide:
Instructions:

After washing face, apply on your skin.

featured_products.name: SK II facial treatment essence serum 30 ml
featured_products.short_description: Revolutionary moisturizer remains to be SK-II's most famous and most loved product. With over 90% Pitera, this hydrating essence provides a light exfoliating effect that boosts metabolism and supports skin's natural renewal cycle. Within as little as 14 days of continued use, skin attains a crystal clear finish with blemishes and dark spots rendered considerably lighter.
featured_products.description:
SK-II Facial Treatment Essence is recommended for all skin types.

It is ideal for those seeking anti-aging treatments as the PITERA found in this product is said to reduce multiple signs of aging. However, if you have sensitive skin, there are several preservatives in this product that may cause dryness or irritation.

One of the best aspects of the SK-II Facial Treatment Essence is the minimal formula. The entire formula consists of only six ingredients (in addition to water).The key ingredient in the SK-II Facial Treatment Essence is PITERA. Also known as galactomyces ferment filtrate, PITERA is a form of yeast that contains over 50 micronutrients and is an excellent source of peptides, proteins, amino acids, carbohydrates, and nucleic acids.


Ingredient list -      Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate (PITERA™), Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Water, Sodium Benzoate, Methylparaben, Sorbic Acid.
featured_products.guide:
How to use:

To use the SK-II Facial Treatment Essence, start by pouring about two to three shakes (approx. the size of a quarter) of essence into hand.

Press palms together to wet both hands. Gently smooth and press over your face and neck for one minute, ensuring even coverage.

Continue patting the essence into skin until fully absorbed. The SK-II Facial Treatment Essence should be used twice daily after toner, but before serum.

featured_products.name: Kaminomoto A Higher Strength Hair Growth Tonic 150mL
featured_products.short_description:
Kaminomoto Higher Strength Hair Tonic helps to prevent premature hair loss. Well-balanced ingredients smooth nutrients supply by promoting blood circulation on the scalp and helps to keep healthy scalp and hair root function to prevent dandruff, itch, and falling hair. Refreshing green floral fragrance. Not sticky. Not oily. Smooth sensation.

Hair nutrient for daily hair care.

Promoting blood circulation on the scalp

Helps to keep healthy scalp and hair root function to prevent dandruff, itch, and falling hair.

Not sticky, not oily, smooth sensation.
featured_products.description:
Kaminomoto A Higher Strength Hair Growth Tonic helps normalizing the hair cycle by improving the hair root, pore, and scalp environment. 

Hair cells renew themselves continuously. Hair can grow normally only as long as a healthy scalp balance is maintained. The secret to keeping your hair healthy and beautiful is through adequate daily care for your hair and scalp 

The multiple prescriptions that are effective for the hair root cause of the thinning and the loss of hair. 

Increases the function of hair growth, and promotes the growth of new hair. Refreshing with green floral fragrance. 
 



 

Ingredients:


Isopropyl methylphenol, ethinyl estradiol, pyridoxine hydrochloride, salicylic acid, Kamigen E, Kamigen K, CS- base,  Water, absolute ethanol, monoammonium glycyrrhizinate, DL-α-tocopherol acetate, L-serine, calcium pantothenate, propylene glycol, dl-menthol, potassium L-aspartate, N,N'-diacetyl- L-cystine dimethyl ester, fragrance
featured_products.guide:
Directions of Use:

Sprinkle a generous amount of KAMINOMOTO A onto the scalp twice a day. Massage gently with fingertips to work in the solution. Treatment should be applied more generously before bedtime to work with the scalp's natural nourishing properties while you sleep.

Generally, 1 to 1.5 bottles a month is the standard usage rate.

Applying an appropriate amount regularly over a long time is more effective than applying a large amount at once.
